objects.text: • Energy Efficient • Smart Controls • Large Capacity

product_details.name: Insignia Front-Load Washer & Dryer Set - Modern Laundry Made Easy
product_details.description:
• Sleek white design with modern digital displays and intuitive controls
• Large capacity front-load washer with multiple wash cycles and settings
• Energy-efficient dryer with advanced moisture sensing technology
• Digital LED display showing cycle time and settings
• Multiple temperature settings and fabric care options
• Easy-access front loading design with large door openings
• Stackable design capability for space-saving installation
• Premium chrome-accented control dials for precise cycle selection
• Quiet operation with advanced vibration reduction
• Convenient quick wash and dry cycles for busy households
• Modern black door frames creating elegant contrast with white finish
• Electronic touch controls with clear cycle indicators

banner_details:
This banner features a clean, modern layout tailored for home appliance promotion. It utilizes a soft radial gradient background shifting from light sky blue to pale blue, centered around a soft white circular element creating depth. The focal point is a realistic product image ("product_image") of a front-load washer and dryer set. A bold heading ("heading") in deep navy blue introduces the category, while a slogan ("tagline") in a vibrant royal blue supports it below. A circular price badge ("price") in a blue gradient highlights affordability, and a bullet list description ("description") reinforces product features. A bright rectangular call-to-action button ("cta_button") labeled with "cta" text encourages interaction.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue (#003366)
- Royal Blue (#005BB7)
- Bright Blue (#0078D7)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Light Sky Blue (#E6F3FF)
- Soft Blue Gradient (#B3D9FF → #E6F3FF)
product_color: The product image features a sleek, modern washer and dryer set with a clean and minimalistic color palette. Dominated by a crisp **matte white** (#FFFFFF) exterior, the design emphasizes cleanliness and modernism. The **black** (#000000) doors with **glossy gradient highlights** create a strong contrast, drawing attention to the core elements of the machines. The use of **metallic silver** (#C0C0C0) for the control knobs adds a premium and functional touch. **Electric blue** (#00BFFF) highlights on digital displays and function indicators provide a tech-savvy, high-clarity aesthetic. These colors blend harmoniously, while still being distinctly visible and engaging for an advertisement banner.
